mqtt package¶

Submodules¶

mqtt.publish module¶

module that contains publish logic.

class mqtt.publish.Publisher¶

Bases: object

Class that contains publish logic. when given a payload and route it will publish to the correct route.

on_disconnect(client, userdata, rc)¶

function to run on disconnect

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the mqtt client

  • userdata ([type]) – the private user data as set in Client() or user_data_set()

  • rc (int) – disconnection result

on_publish(client, userdata, result)¶

function to run on successful publish

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: [type] :param result: Data being published :type result: String

publish(payload, topic)¶

initialises client and binds functions, publish received payload to MP and disconnects.

Parameters

  • payload (any) – the item that’s being sent, will be converted into json.

  • topic (string) – topic to publish to

mqtt.subscribe module¶

module that contains logic for subscribe.

class mqtt.subscribe.Subscriber¶

Bases: object

A class that contains subscriber logic.

on_connect(client, userdata, flags, rc)¶

subscribe to the topics that were initialised.

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as

set in Client() or user_data_set() :type userdata: any :param flags: response flags sent by the broker :type flags: dict :param rc: result of connection :type rc: integer

on_log(client, userdata, level, buf)¶

function to run for logging.

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client() or

user_data_set() :type userdata: any :param level: severity of the message :type level: MQTT_LOG_INFO, MQTT_LOG_NOTICE, MQTT_LOG_WARNING, MQTT_LOG_ERR, MQTT_LOG_DEBUG :param buf: message buffer :type buf: bytes

on_message(client, userdata, msg)¶

prints out the topic and payload, prints to console different messages depending on topic. Also handles saving pictures if topic is facial recognition.

Parameters

  • client (Client) – the client instance for this callback

  • userdata – the private user data as set in Client()

or user_data_set() :type userdata: any :param msg: an instance of MQTTMessage. This is a class with members topic, payload, qos, retain. :type msg: MQTTMessage

process_message(msg)¶

this is the main receiver code. Processes the message, check if everything arrives succesfuly.

Parameters

msg (json, string, bytes) – message that was published

Returns

boolean

Return type

boolean

subscribe()¶

initialises mqtt client. binds on connect, message and log functions to the client. connects to the address and starts loop.
